about_the_game:
Rap Pop Jump Core is a hardcore action platformer that demands constant movement, quick decision-making, and simultaneous combat with enemies. Immerse yourself in the vibrant Rap Pop Jump Core city, where the only way to traverse is by leaping from one platform to another. One wrong move, and you'll plummet to your fate. Use your agility and skills to navigate swiftly and escape the city.



Key Features:

  • Intense Action:

    Engage in fast-paced platforming and combat, where quick reflexes and sharp decision-making are essential to survive and progress.

  • Dynamic Environment:

    Explore a lively and ever-changing cityscape filled with platforms, each requiring precise timing and strategy to navigate successfully.

  • Thrilling Challenges:

    Confront various enemies and obstacles that add layers of difficulty, testing your skills and keeping you on your toes.

  • Skill-Based Gameplay:

    Master the art of rapid movement and combat, using your abilities to outmaneuver foes and avoid deadly falls as you strive to escape the city's perilous heights.

Rap Pop Jump Core is a hardcore action platformer that demands constant movement, quick decision-making, and simultaneous combat with enemies. Immerse yourself in the vibrant Rap Pop Jump Core city, where the only way to traverse is by leaping from one platform to another. One wrong move, and you'll plummet to your fate. name: Rap Pop Jump Core

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: Rap Pop Jump Core is a hardcore action platformer demanding constant movement, quick decisions, and combat. Navigate a vibrant city by leaping between platforms. One mistake, and you fall to your fate. Escape swiftly!
